message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $120 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would $90 be acceptable for the product?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  While $90 is a bit low for me, I'm happy to negotiate. Could you meet me halfway at $105?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could we agree on $100 for the product?
